About Me

My name is Gao Tianze. I'm 19 years old from Beijing, China, before my whole education life was in public schools. I'm currently studying Multimedia at Dublin City University.

My Work

I have learned a lot during my study in the multimedia major. I have made my first attempts in various aspects (such as photography and sound production, web design, etc.) and felt a sense of achievement when completing each challenging task and assignment. During the learning process, I also made friends with like-minded people and look forward to mastering more skills in the future.

My Hobbies

Among all my hobbies, photography is my favorite. It's like my companion, accompanying me on my travels and sharing the beauty of the world with me. The following are some photos I took recently in the center of Dublin. This is also my first street photography since I came to this country.
